title: Contemporary Diamond Mangalsutra – A Modern Twist on Tradition
features: Delicate black bead strand adorned with rose gold, leaf-shaped CZ pendants evenly spaced throughout. Contemporary design, blending traditional significance with modern aesthetics. Features a secure lobster clasp for easy wear.
description: This Mangalsutra offers a unique blend of tradition and contemporary style, making it perfect for the modern woman. The rose gold accents and sparkling CZ stones add a touch of elegance, while the black beads retain the traditional significance of the Mangalsutra. Comfortable for everyday wear and a stylish statement piece.
